description.value:
You can spend @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice in the following ways:

  • Divine Average: Spend a @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die before you roll a skill check or attack roll to automatically roll 10 instead. This does not count as an Eikonic Number.
